product_name: Burton Stiletto EST Snowboard Bindings - Women's - 2013/2014
long_description: The Burton Stiletto EST snowboard bindings for women give you the support and comfort needed to enjoy a day on the mountain. These bindings feature an extra-flexy feel perfect for all-mountain riders. Women-specific True Fit(TM) Design creates boots and bindings specifically for the way a woman rides, ensuring complete control, total power and ultimate fun. Single-component, lightweight yet tough, polycarbonate baseplates provide moderate flex and consistent response for a versatile ride on all terrain. Removable ShredBED(TM) 2.0 footbed system protects against impacts while still allowing great board feel; stance indicator window allows easy mounting and adjustment. Ergonomically-canted highbacks eliminate hardware to save weight; forward lean and highback rotation adjust independently of each other for a precise fit. Highbacks rotate side to side to follow the natural contours of your calves, optimizing power and comfort; forward lean adjusts quickly and easily without a tool. Lush ankle straps and premium toe straps lock you into the bindings; precurved and padded, they feature telescoping and multi-location adjustability. Primo capstrap toe straps feature a 3D, curved fit; built-in grip keeps straps in place. Smooth Glide(TM) buckles are strong and easy to grab for quick closure and release. 2014 Stilleto EST bindings will fit 2011 through 2014 Channel Boards with the included black hardware.
